name: Emaki
summary:
Marble popper mobile action-puzzle game designed for mobile devices. In this game, players embark on a challenging journey to assist a young artist in creating her magical masterpieces.

The objective of the game is to guide a carriage that can shoot and destroy incoming balls, which are imbued with magic paints. The player's task is to eliminate these balls before they reach a well and color the paintings they pass by.

This game offers a substantial amount of content, featuring a total of 25 levels within the adventure. Players can explore different game modes, collect jewels and power-ups, and strive to unlock various achievements. Success in "Marble Popper" requires precise aiming and strategic planning as players progress through increasingly challenging levels.
